programme.title: الجائزة الكبرى - جولة عالمية – القفز - جولة فيينا 2025 - الفروسية
programme.desc: الفئة الرئيسية في محطة فيينا. يؤدي المسار الصعب إلى قفزة قوية حيث تحدد الدقة والنطاق والعصب الكأس ونقاط البطولة القيمة.

programme.title: الجائزة الكبرى - جولة عالمية – القفز - جولة فيينا 2025 - الفروسية

programme.title: هافر إيه سي ضد أنجيه - الدوري الفرنسي 1 2025/2026 الأسبوع 17
programme.desc: خسر نادي لو هافر مباراتين من مبارياته الثلاث الأخيرة على أرضه ضد أنجيه في جميع المسابقات، بعد فوزه بـ 13 من 14 مباراة سابقة. فشل لو هافر في التسجيل في مبارياته الأربع الأخيرة في دوري الدرجة الأولى ويمكن أن يعادل أطول فترة جفاف من هذا القبيل، والتي يعود تاريخها إلى نوفمبر 1987 - فبراير 1988.

programme.title: هافر إيه سي ضد أنجيه - الدوري الفرنسي 1 2025/2026 الأسبوع 17
programme.desc: خسر نادي لو هافر مباراتين من مبارياته الثلاث الأخيرة على أرضه ضد أنجيه في جميع المسابقات، بعد فوزه بـ 13 من 14 مباراة سابقة. فشل لو هافر في التسجيل في مبارياته الأربع الأخيرة في دوري الدرجة الأولى ويمكن أن يعادل أطول فترة جفاف من هذا القبيل، والتي يعود تاريخها إلى نوفمبر 1987 - فبراير 1988.

programme.title: مضمار البطولات الأربع الكبرى لألعاب القوى - ميامي - اليوم الأول
programme.desc: تبدأ مرحلة ميامي من البطولات الأربع الكبرى لألعاب القوى بيوم متفجر 1، يتميز بدرجات حرارة افتتاحية وجولات تأهيلية عبر السباقات السريعة والعقبات والأحداث الميدانية. يهدف أفضل الرياضيين إلى ضبط النغمة وتأمين المراكز المبكرة في مطاردة الذهب.

programme.title: T100 Triathlon World Tour 2025 - سان فرانسيسكو - نخبة من الرجال والنساء
programme.desc: أفضل الرياضيين الثلاثي في العالم يأخذون الشوارع والساحل الشهير في سان فرانسيسكو في هذه المحطة المثيرة من سلسلة T100 Triathlon World Series. اختبار 100 كم من القدرة على التحمل عبر السباحة وركوب الدراجات والجري، هذه الجولة تعد بمنافسة شرسة ولحظات لا تنسى.

programme.title: T100 Triathlon World Tour 2025 - سان فرانسيسكو - نخبة من الرجال والنساء
programme.desc: أفضل الرياضيين الثلاثي في العالم يأخذون الشوارع والساحل الشهير في سان فرانسيسكو في هذه المحطة المثيرة من سلسلة T100 Triathlon World Series. اختبار 100 كم من القدرة على التحمل عبر السباحة وركوب الدراجات والجري، هذه الجولة تعد بمنافسة شرسة ولحظات لا تنسى.

programme.title: البطولات الأربع الكبرى لألعاب القوى – فيلادلفيا اليوم الأول - 2025
programme.desc: تنطلق البطولات الأربع الكبرى لألعاب القوى في فيلادلفيا مع تشكيلة مثيرة من التصفيات والتصفيات. من السباقات القوية إلى الأحداث الميدانية الدقيقة، يبدأ أفضل الرياضيين في العالم سعيهم للحصول على اللمسات الأخيرة على منصة التتويج في هذه المسابقة الدولية للنخبة.

programme.title: البطولات الأربع الكبرى لألعاب القوى – فيلادلفيا اليوم الأول - 2025
programme.desc: تنطلق البطولات الأربع الكبرى لألعاب القوى في فيلادلفيا مع تشكيلة مثيرة من التصفيات والتصفيات. من السباقات القوية إلى الأحداث الميدانية الدقيقة، يبدأ أفضل الرياضيين في العالم سعيهم للحصول على اللمسات الأخيرة على منصة التتويج في هذه المسابقة الدولية للنخبة.

programme.title: البطولات الأربع الكبرى لألعاب القوى – فيلادلفيا اليوم الثاني - 2025
programme.desc: يقدم اليوم الثاني من العمل في فيلادلفيا نهائيات عالية المخاطر عبر تخصصات متعددة. توقع العروض المثيرة والتشطيبات الدرامية واللحظات البارزة حيث يطارد النجوم العالميون النصر في واحدة من أكبر المراحل الرياضية.

programme.title: البطولات الأربع الكبرى لألعاب القوى – فيلادلفيا اليوم الثاني - 2025
programme.desc: يقدم اليوم الثاني من العمل في فيلادلفيا نهائيات عالية المخاطر عبر تخصصات متعددة. توقع العروض المثيرة والتشطيبات الدرامية واللحظات البارزة حيث يطارد النجوم العالميون النصر في واحدة من أكبر المراحل الرياضية.

programme.title: T100 Triathlon - PTO - نهائي جولة العالم 2025 - الدوحة
programme.desc: ستقام نهائيات T100 Triathlon World Tour في الدوحة/لوسيل (10–13 ديسمبر 2025) كمواجهة في نهاية الموسم تتوج بطل العالم في T100. يتميز السباق بالمجال الاحترافي ذي المستوى العالمي، حيث يتم التنافس على شكل T100 (السباحة لمسافة 2 كم، الدراجة لمسافة 80 كم، الركض لمسافة 18 كم) على مسار محدد حول الدوحة ولوسيل، مع السباق الاحترافي الحاسم المقرر عقده في 12 ديسمبر 2025 (09:45 بالتوقيت العربي القياسي) في قطر.

programme.title: T100 Triathlon - PTO - نهائي جولة العالم 2025 - الدوحة
programme.desc: ستقام نهائيات T100 Triathlon World Tour في الدوحة/لوسيل (10–13 ديسمبر 2025) كمواجهة في نهاية الموسم تتوج بطل العالم في T100. يتميز السباق بالمجال الاحترافي ذي المستوى العالمي، حيث يتم التنافس على شكل T100 (السباحة لمسافة 2 كم، الدراجة لمسافة 80 كم، الركض لمسافة 18 كم) على مسار محدد حول الدوحة ولوسيل، مع السباق الاحترافي الحاسم المقرر عقده في 12 ديسمبر 2025 (09:45 بالتوقيت العربي القياسي) في قطر.

programme.title: السباق الرئيسي - ماراثون إشبيلية 2025
programme.desc: من المقرر أن تحتفل زيورخ ماراتون دي إشبيلية 2025 بالذكرى الأربعين لتأسيسها يوم الأحد 23 فبراير في إشبيلية، إسبانيا. يشتهر هذا الحدث بمساره المسطح والسريع، وقد أصبح مفضلاً لدى نخبة العدائين والهواة على حد سواء.

programme.title: دنفر مقابل بوسطن - موسم الدوري الاميركي للمحترفين 2025–2026
programme.desc: تغطية حية وحصرية على beIN للرابطة الوطنية لكرة السلة، الدوري الاميركي للمحترفين. يتكون الدوري الاميركي للمحترفين من 30 فريقا وهو واحد من الدوريات الرياضية الاحترافية الكبرى في الولايات المتحدة وكندا وهو الدوري المحترف الأول لكرة السلة في العالم.

programme.title: سان جيرمان ضد باريس - الدوري الفرنسي 1 2025/2026 الأسبوع 17 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: Two clubs from the Paris region will face each other for the first time in Ligue 1 since 25 February 1990, when Paris SG met Racing Paris. If Racing are considered being based in Colombes, this will be the first Ligue 1 match between two clubs from the same city since Paris SG-Paris FC on 17 December 1978. This will be the third meeting in all competitions between Paris Saint-Germain and Paris FC, following two draws in Ligue 1 in 1978. Paris Saint-Germain have not lost any of their last 38 home games against a promoted side in Ligue 1, with their last defeat coming against Montpellier on 15 May 2010.

programme.title: سان جيرمان ضد باريس - الدوري الفرنسي 1 2025/2026 الأسبوع 17 - مباراة مصغرة

programme.title: مانشستر سيتي ضد برايتون وهوف ألبيون - الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز 2025/2026 الأسبوع 21 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: جميع المباريات البالغ عددها 380 مباراة من الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز مباشرة وحصرية فقط على beIN. جميع المطابقات متاحة مباشرة مع اختيار التعليق باللغة العربية أو الإنجليزية. سيتألف الموسم من 33 عطلة نهاية أسبوع وخمس جولات من المباريات في منتصف الأسبوع. ليفربول هو حامل اللقب، بعد أن فاز بلقبه الثاني في الدوري الممتاز.

programme.title: مانشستر سيتي ضد برايتون وهوف ألبيون - الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز 2025/2026 الأسبوع 21
programme.desc: لم يخسر مانشستر سيتي أبدًا في 15 مباراة في الدوري المحلي ضد برايتون، وهما أكثر ما واجهه فريقًا دون أن يخسر على أرضه، وأكثر ما لعبه برايتون مع أي شخص على الطريق دون أن يفوز أبدًا. لم يهزم برايتون في مبارياته الثلاث الأخيرة في الدوري الممتاز ضد مانشستر سيتي، بعد أن تجنب الهزيمة في مباراتين فقط من أول 14 مباراة ضده في المسابقة.

programme.title: إسبانيول ضد برشلونة - الدوري الإسباني 2025/26 - الأسبوع 18 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979 and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

programme.title: ريال مدريد ضد ريال بيتيس - الدوري الإسباني 2025/26 - الأسبوع 18 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: Real Madrid lost their last La Liga game against Real Betis, 2-1 in March 2025, after having been unbeaten in their previous nine encounters. They have not lost two consecutive league games against Real Betis since 1999. Real Madrid have won just two of their last eight home games against Real Betis, failing to score in six of those matches – they have failed to score in six home games against the Verdiblancos in LaLiga since the 2017/18 season, at least two more than against any other opponent.

programme.title: سان جيرمان ضد باريس - الدوري الفرنسي 1 2025/2026 الأسبوع 17 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: Two clubs from the Paris region will face each other for the first time in Ligue 1 since 25 February 1990, when Paris SG met Racing Paris. If Racing are considered being based in Colombes, this will be the first Ligue 1 match between two clubs from the same city since Paris SG-Paris FC on 17 December 1978. This will be the third meeting in all competitions between Paris Saint-Germain and Paris FC, following two draws in Ligue 1 in 1978. Paris Saint-Germain have not lost any of their last 38 home games against a promoted side in Ligue 1, with their last defeat coming against Montpellier on 15 May 2010.

programme.title: كليفلاند ضد مينيسوتا الدوري الاميركي للمحترفين موسم 2025–2026
programme.desc: تغطية حية وحصرية على beIN للرابطة الوطنية لكرة السلة، الدوري الاميركي للمحترفين. يتكون الدوري الاميركي للمحترفين من 30 فريقا وهو واحد من الدوريات الرياضية الاحترافية الكبرى في الولايات المتحدة وكندا وهو الدوري المحترف الأول لكرة السلة في العالم.

programme.title: إسبانيول ضد برشلونة - الدوري الإسباني 2025/26 - الأسبوع 18 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979 and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

programme.title: ريال مدريد ضد ريال بيتيس - الدوري الإسباني 2025/26 - الأسبوع 18 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: Real Madrid lost their last La Liga game against Real Betis, 2-1 in March 2025, after having been unbeaten in their previous nine encounters. They have not lost two consecutive league games against Real Betis since 1999. Real Madrid have won just two of their last eight home games against Real Betis, failing to score in six of those matches – they have failed to score in six home games against the Verdiblancos in LaLiga since the 2017/18 season, at least two more than against any other opponent.

programme.title: سان جيرمان ضد باريس - الدوري الفرنسي 1 2025/2026 الأسبوع 17 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: Two clubs from the Paris region will face each other for the first time in Ligue 1 since 25 February 1990, when Paris SG met Racing Paris. If Racing are considered being based in Colombes, this will be the first Ligue 1 match between two clubs from the same city since Paris SG-Paris FC on 17 December 1978. This will be the third meeting in all competitions between Paris Saint-Germain and Paris FC, following two draws in Ligue 1 in 1978. Paris Saint-Germain have not lost any of their last 38 home games against a promoted side in Ligue 1, with their last defeat coming against Montpellier on 15 May 2010.

programme.title: ريكسهام ضد نوتنغهام فورست - كأس الإمارات لكرة القدم 2025-26 - الجولة 3
programme.desc: كأس التحدي لاتحاد كرة القدم، والمعروف أكثر باسم كأس الاتحاد الإنجليزي، هي أقدم مسابقة وطنية لكرة القدم في العالم يعود تاريخها إلى موسم 1871-1872. يتنافس 736 ناديًا للحصول على فرصة لرفع واحدة من أشهر بطولات كرة القدم الإنجليزية. جميع أفضل المباريات مباشرة وحصرية فقط على beIN.

programme.title: EN Spirit of Sport Series 11 | E2
programme.desc: This month on Spirit of Sport, Real Madrid and England footballer Jude Bellingham takes us back to the start of his journey in Birmingham and opens up about his mental health. Ahead of the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milano Cortina, freestyle skier Eileen Gu reflects on her journey to gold. Cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar and tennis icon Novak Djokovic spotlight the transformative power of sport and how they’re using their platforms to give back. England Lioness Georgia Stanway visits a special football project in London to inspire the next generation.

programme.title: EN Spirit of Sport Series 11 | E2
programme.desc: This month on Spirit of Sport, Real Madrid and England footballer Jude Bellingham takes us back to the start of his journey in Birmingham and opens up about his mental health. Ahead of the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milano Cortina, freestyle skier Eileen Gu reflects on her journey to gold. Cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar and tennis icon Novak Djokovic spotlight the transformative power of sport and how they’re using their platforms to give back. England Lioness Georgia Stanway visits a special football project in London to inspire the next generation.

programme.title: ليستر سيتي ضد وست بروميتش البيون - EFL - الدوري الإنجليزي لكرة القدم SkyBet - بطولة 2025/2
programme.desc: لم يخسر ليستر في آخر ثماني مباريات له في الدوري ضد وست بروميتش منذ الخسارة 2-1 على أرضه في نوفمبر 2016. بعد أن لم يخسر في أول سبع زيارات له في الدوري إلى استاد كينغ باور بين عامي 2007 و 2017، خسر وست بروميتش مباراتيه الأخيرتين في الدوري خارج أرضه ضد ليستر.

programme.title: برمنغهام سيتي مقابل كوفنتري سيتي - EFL - الدوري الإنجليزي لكرة القدم SkyBet - بطولة 2025/2026
programme.desc: فازت برمنغهام بمباراة واحدة فقط من آخر 10 مباريات في الدوري ضد كوفنتري، على الرغم من أنها كانت في اجتماعها الأخير على أرضها في أبريل 2024. يتطلع كوفنتري لإكمال الدوري مرتين على برمنغهام للمرة الرابعة فقط، وسبق أن فعل ذلك في 1965-1966، 1974-1975 و2008 -09.

programme.title: La Liga Highlights 2025/2026
programme.desc: "This 55-minute program offers full 5-minute highlights of each of the games played on Friday, Saturday and Sunday.LALIGA includes special video presentations of the best goal, the best save and the best player of the day."

programme.title: إسبانيول ضد برشلونة - الدوري الإسباني 2025/26 - الأسبوع 18 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979 and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

programme.title: ريال مدريد ضد ريال بيتيس - الدوري الإسباني 2025/26 - الأسبوع 18 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: Real Madrid lost their last La Liga game against Real Betis, 2-1 in March 2025, after having been unbeaten in their previous nine encounters. They have not lost two consecutive league games against Real Betis since 1999. Real Madrid have won just two of their last eight home games against Real Betis, failing to score in six of those matches – they have failed to score in six home games against the Verdiblancos in LaLiga since the 2017/18 season, at least two more than against any other opponent.

programme.title: Ligue 1 Weekly Review - 2025/2026
programme.desc: Each Ligue 1 Match week is condensed into a 52-minute highlights show. Every game, goal, penalty, red card and everything in between is squeezed into an action-packed hour to ensure no football fan misses a kick across the game season.

programme.title: سان جيرمان ضد باريس - الدوري الفرنسي 1 2025/2026 الأسبوع 17 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: Two clubs from the Paris region will face each other for the first time in Ligue 1 since 25 February 1990, when Paris SG met Racing Paris. If Racing are considered being based in Colombes, this will be the first Ligue 1 match between two clubs from the same city since Paris SG-Paris FC on 17 December 1978. This will be the third meeting in all competitions between Paris Saint-Germain and Paris FC, following two draws in Ligue 1 in 1978. Paris Saint-Germain have not lost any of their last 38 home games against a promoted side in Ligue 1, with their last defeat coming against Montpellier on 15 May 2010.

programme.title: سان جيرمان ضد باريس - الدوري الفرنسي 1 2025/2026 الأسبوع 17 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: Two clubs from the Paris region will face each other for the first time in Ligue 1 since 25 February 1990, when Paris SG met Racing Paris. If Racing are considered being based in Colombes, this will be the first Ligue 1 match between two clubs from the same city since Paris SG-Paris FC on 17 December 1978. This will be the third meeting in all competitions between Paris Saint-Germain and Paris FC, following two draws in Ligue 1 in 1978. Paris Saint-Germain have not lost any of their last 38 home games against a promoted side in Ligue 1, with their last defeat coming against Montpellier on 15 May 2010.

programme.title: إسبانيول ضد برشلونة - الدوري الإسباني 2025/26 - الأسبوع 18 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979 and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

programme.title: ريال مدريد ضد ريال بيتيس - الدوري الإسباني 2025/26 - الأسبوع 18 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: Real Madrid lost their last La Liga game against Real Betis, 2-1 in March 2025, after having been unbeaten in their previous nine encounters. They have not lost two consecutive league games against Real Betis since 1999. Real Madrid have won just two of their last eight home games against Real Betis, failing to score in six of those matches – they have failed to score in six home games against the Verdiblancos in LaLiga since the 2017/18 season, at least two more than against any other opponent.

programme.title: Fulham vs. Liverpool - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Hugo Ekitiké has scored three goals in his last two Premier League away games, having scored just once in his first six on the road for Liverpool. He last scored in more consecutive away league games in December 2021. Fulham’s Harry Wilson has been involved in four goals in his last seven home league appearances, more than he had in his previous 20 at Craven Cottage.

programme.title: Manchester City vs. Chelsea - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Each of Cole Palmer’s last nine Premier League goals for Chelsea have been scored in London. He’s not scored outside of the capital since December 2024, while he’s not scored north of London since August 2024. Erling Haaland has scored 11 goals in eight Premier League home games for Man City this season, netting twice in five different games. The last player to score 2+ goals in more different home games in a season was Haaland himself in 2022-23.

programme.title: West Ham United vs. Nottingham Forest - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: West Ham are looking to complete their first league double over Nottingham Forest since 2011-12 in the Championship, and first in the top-flight since 1968-69. Nottingham Forest won this exact fixture 2-1 last season, last winning consecutive away league games against West Ham between 1982 and 1984.

Though they’ve lost just two of their 19 Premier League games against Burnley, Man Utd are looking to secure the Premier League double over them for just the second time after 2020-21.

programme.title: Arsenal vs. Liverpool - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: لم يخسر أرسنال ضد أي فريق مباريات في الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز أكثر مما خسره ضد ليفربول. ليفربول يتطلع لإكمال الدوري الممتاز المزدوج على آرسنال للمرة الثامنة، والأولى منذ 2021-2022. إن "أزواجهم" السبعة هي بالفعل أكثر ما يملكه أي فريق ضد المدفعين في المسابقة.

programme.desc: West Ham are looking to complete their first league double over Nottingham Forest since 2011-12 in the Championship, and first in the top-flight since 1968-69. programme.title: La Liga Highlights 2025/2026
programme.desc: "This 55-minute program offers full 5-minute highlights of each of the games played on Friday, Saturday and Sunday.LALIGA includes special video presentations of the best goal, the best save and the best player of the day."

programme.title: إسبانيول ضد برشلونة - الدوري الإسباني 2025/26 - الأسبوع 18 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979 and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

programme.title: ريال مدريد ضد ريال بيتيس - الدوري الإسباني 2025/26 - الأسبوع 18 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: Real Madrid lost their last La Liga game against Real Betis, 2-1 in March 2025, after having been unbeaten in their previous nine encounters. They have not lost two consecutive league games against Real Betis since 1999. Real Madrid have won just two of their last eight home games against Real Betis, failing to score in six of those matches – they have failed to score in six home games against the Verdiblancos in LaLiga since the 2017/18 season, at least two more than against any other opponent.

programme.title: Ligue 1 Weekly Review - 2025/2026
programme.desc: Each Ligue 1 Match week is condensed into a 52-minute highlights show. Every game, goal, penalty, red card and everything in between is squeezed into an action-packed hour to ensure no football fan misses a kick across the game season.

programme.title: سان جيرمان ضد باريس - الدوري الفرنسي 1 2025/2026 الأسبوع 17 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: Two clubs from the Paris region will face each other for the first time in Ligue 1 since 25 February 1990, when Paris SG met Racing Paris. If Racing are considered being based in Colombes, this will be the first Ligue 1 match between two clubs from the same city since Paris SG-Paris FC on 17 December 1978. This will be the third meeting in all competitions between Paris Saint-Germain and Paris FC, following two draws in Ligue 1 in 1978. Paris Saint-Germain have not lost any of their last 38 home games against a promoted side in Ligue 1, with their last defeat coming against Montpellier on 15 May 2010.

programme.title: سان جيرمان ضد باريس - الدوري الفرنسي 1 2025/2026 الأسبوع 17 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: Two clubs from the Paris region will face each other for the first time in Ligue 1 since 25 February 1990, when Paris SG met Racing Paris. If Racing are considered being based in Colombes, this will be the first Ligue 1 match between two clubs from the same city since Paris SG-Paris FC on 17 December 1978. This will be the third meeting in all competitions between Paris Saint-Germain and Paris FC, following two draws in Ligue 1 in 1978. Paris Saint-Germain have not lost any of their last 38 home games against a promoted side in Ligue 1, with their last defeat coming against Montpellier on 15 May 2010.

programme.title: إسبانيول ضد برشلونة - الدوري الإسباني 2025/26 - الأسبوع 18 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979 and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

programme.title: ريال مدريد ضد ريال بيتيس - الدوري الإسباني 2025/26 - الأسبوع 18 - مباراة مصغرة
programme.desc: Real Madrid lost their last La Liga game against Real Betis, 2-1 in March 2025, after having been unbeaten in their previous nine encounters. They have not lost two consecutive league games against Real Betis since 1999. Real Madrid have won just two of their last eight home games against Real Betis, failing to score in six of those matches – they have failed to score in six home games against the Verdiblancos in LaLiga since the 2017/18 season, at least two more than against any other opponent.

programme.title: ريكسهام ضد نوتنغهام فورست - كأس الإمارات لكرة القدم 2025-26 - الجولة 3
programme.desc: كأس التحدي لاتحاد كرة القدم، والمعروف أكثر باسم كأس الاتحاد الإنجليزي، هي أقدم مسابقة وطنية لكرة القدم في العالم يعود تاريخها إلى موسم 1871-1872. يتنافس 736 ناديًا للحصول على فرصة لرفع واحدة من أشهر بطولات كرة القدم الإنجليزية. جميع أفضل المباريات مباشرة وحصرية فقط على beIN.

programme.title: Osasuna vs Athletic Club - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18
programme.desc: Osasuna have won just one of their last nine LaLiga games against Athletic Club, a 2-0 win in May 2023, and none of their last four, drawing the most recent. They haven't recorded two consecutive draws against the Basque team in the competition since November 2000. Athletic Club have won eight of their last 11 LaLiga visits to El Sadar, achieving more away victories against Osasuna than against any other opponent in the competition since the 2010-11 season.

programme.title: Espanyol vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18
programme.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979 and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

programme.title: Lorient vs Metz - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 17
programme.desc: Lorient have won 56% of their Ligue 1 matches against Metz, their highest win ratio against an opponent faced at least ten times in the top-flight. programme.title: PSG vs Paris FC - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 17
programme.desc: Two clubs from the Paris region will face each other for the first time in Ligue 1 since 25 February 1990, when Paris SG met Racing Paris. If Racing are considered being based in Colombes, this will be the first Ligue 1 match between two clubs from the same city since Paris SG-Paris FC on 17 December 1978. This will be the third meeting in all competitions between Paris Saint-Germain and Paris FC, following two draws in Ligue 1 in 1978. Paris Saint-Germain have not lost any of their last 38 home games against a promoted side in Ligue 1, with their last defeat coming against Montpellier on 15 May 2010.

programme.title: Melbourne City FC (AUS) vs Sanfrecce Hiroshima (JPN) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East M
programme.desc: This will be the first-ever AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Melbourne City and Sanfrecce Hiroshima; City are winless in each of their two games against Japanese opposition in the competition, while a win for Sanfrecce would see them beat Australian opponents in three consecutive games for the first time in competition history. Melbourne City are winless in each of their last three matches in the AFC Champions League Elite, their longest such run in the competition; in fact, they have begun each of their previous two campaigns in the competition with draws.

programme.title: Gangwon FC (KOR) vs Shanghai Shenhua FC (CHN) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD1
programme.desc: This will be the first AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Gangwon and Shanghai Shenhua, with the former set to play their first-ever game in the competition; Shenhua have lost each of their last two matches against South Korean opposition in the Champions League Elite, another defeat here will see them equal their longest such run in competition history. Shanghai Shenhua lost their most recent AFC Champions League Elite match 0-4 to Kawasaki Frontale on 12 March 2025; failure to score against Gangwon will see them go scoreless in consecutive games for the first time in the competition since May 2011.

programme.title: Al Ahli Saudi FC (KSA) vs PFC Nasaf (UZB) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD1
programme.desc: This will be the fifth AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Al-Ahli and Nasaf, with Nasaf’s only win coming in their most recent such game on 2 March 2016 ; Al-Ahli’s most recent game in the competition against Uzbek opposition was a 2-1 win over Pakhtakor Tashkent on 20 May 2019, a win here will see them win two consecutive such games for the first time in competition history. Al-Ahli are unbeaten in each of their last 18 AFC Champions League Elite games, including the final of the 2024-25 edition ; avoiding defeat here will see them equal Gamba Osaka for the joint third-longest such run in the competition.

programme.desc: This will be the first ever AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Al Shorta and Al Sadd; Iraqi teams have won five of their last seven matches against Qatari sides in the competition, after winning just one of the first seven. programme.title: Al Hilal SFC (KSA) vs Al Duhail SC (QAT) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD1
programme.desc: Al Duhail won their first AFC Champions League Elite meeting with Al-Hilal, but Al-Hilal are unbeaten in the six since, including their joint-biggest win in the competition – Al Duhail’s heaviest defeat in the tournament. Qatari teams have lost their last five matches against Saudi sides in the competition; their last win was Al Sadd’s 2-1 victory over Al-Nassr in December 2014. Qatari teams have lost more matches and conceded more goals against Saudi teams than against any other nation.

programme.title: Jannik Sinner (ITA) vs Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) - Gentlemen’s Singles Final - Centre Court - Wimbledon 2
programme.desc: Top seed Jannik Sinner takes on defending champion Carlos Alcaraz in a blockbuster Wimbledon final. This is their fifth career meeting, with Alcaraz leading the head-to-head 3–1. Sinner is chasing his first Wimbledon crown, while Alcaraz aims for a historic third straight title. A generational battle on Centre Court.

programme.title: Jannik Sinner (ITA) vs Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) - Gentlemen’s Singles Final - Centre Court - Wimbledon 2
programme.desc: Top seed Jannik Sinner takes on defending champion Carlos Alcaraz in a blockbuster Wimbledon final. This is their fifth career meeting, with Alcaraz leading the head-to-head 3–1. Sinner is chasing his first Wimbledon crown, while Alcaraz aims for a historic third straight title. A generational battle on Centre Court.

programme.title: Amanda Anisimova (USA) vs Iga Swiatek (POL) - Ladies’ Singles Final - Centre Court - Wimbledon 2025
programme.desc: A first-time Wimbledon champion will be crowned as Iga Świątek faces Amanda Anisimova. Świątek, a five-time Grand Slam winner, reaches her first final at SW19. Anisimova, playing her maiden major final, stunned world No. 1 Sabalenka in the semis. This is their first-ever meeting. Experience vs momentum — who will triumph on Centre Court?

programme.title: Amanda Anisimova (USA) vs Iga Swiatek (POL) - Ladies’ Singles Final - Centre Court - Wimbledon 2025

programme.title: AO Originals - Ambition
programme.desc: AMBITION is the story of tennis’ fearless new breed rewriting the rules on the sport’s biggest stage - with Alcaraz, Sinner, Gauff, Swiatek and a wave of hungry young challengers reshaping the game with raw talent and audacious self-belief

programme.title: AO Originals - Ambition
programme.desc: AMBITION is the story of tennis’ fearless new breed rewriting the rules on the sport’s biggest stage - with Alcaraz, Sinner, Gauff, Swiatek and a wave of hungry young challengers reshaping the game with raw talent and audacious self-belief

programme.title: Jannik Sinner (ITA) vs Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) - Cincinnati Open 2025 - ATP 1000
programme.desc: World No. 1 Jannik Sinner, holder of four Masters 1000 titles and 20 ATP singles trophies, comes into the Cincinnati final after winning two titles this season, including the Australian Open and Wimbledon. Across the net stands Carlos Alcaraz, with seven Masters crowns, 21 career titles, and five tournament victories already in 2025. Their rivalry remains one of the sport’s most exciting, with Alcaraz leading the head-to-head 8–5.

programme.desc: World No. 1 Jannik Sinner, holder of four Masters 1000 titles and 20 ATP singles trophies, comes into the Cincinnati final after winning two titles this season, including the Australian Open and Wimbledon. Across the net stands Carlos Alcaraz, with seven Masters crowns, 21 career titles, and five tournament victories already in 2025. Their rivalry remains one of the sport’s most exciting, with Alcaraz leading the head-to-head 8–5.

programme.title: Jannik Sinner (ITA) vs Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) - Gentlemen’s Singles Final - Centre Court - Wimbledon 2
programme.desc: Top seed Jannik Sinner takes on defending champion Carlos Alcaraz in a blockbuster Wimbledon final. This is their fifth career meeting, with Alcaraz leading the head-to-head 3–1. Sinner is chasing his first Wimbledon crown, while Alcaraz aims for a historic third straight title. A generational battle on Centre Court.

programme.title: Amanda Anisimova (USA) vs Iga Swiatek (POL) - Ladies’ Singles Final - Centre Court - Wimbledon 2025
programme.desc: A first-time Wimbledon champion will be crowned as Iga Świątek faces Amanda Anisimova. Świątek, a five-time Grand Slam winner, reaches her first final at SW19. Anisimova, playing her maiden major final, stunned world No. 1 Sabalenka in the semis. This is their first-ever meeting. Experience vs momentum — who will triumph on Centre Court?

programme.title: Felix AUGER-ALIASSIME (CAN) vs Jannik SINNER (ITA) - Final - Rolex Paris Masters - Paris - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Rolex Paris Masters will be held from 27 October to 2 November at the new Paris La Défense Arena. Now in its 54th edition, this ATP Masters 1000 tournament features the world’s top players battling on indoor hard courts in both singles and doubles draws. With total prize money of €6,128,940, the event serves as the final major stop before the ATP Finals, promising a thrilling conclusion to the tennis season.

programme.title: Jannik Sinner vs Carlos Alcaraz - Men’s Singles Final - Arthur Ashe Court - Tennis US Open 2025
programme.desc: Two young giants renew one of tennis’s fiercest rivalries. Alcaraz, already a two-time Grand Slam champion and former US Open winner, leads their head-to-head by a slim margin. Sinner, the 2024 Australian Open champion, seeks to level the balance. A clash of power, speed, and mental edge with the title in New York on the line.

programme.title: Aryna Sabalenka vs Amanda Anisimova - Women’s Singles Final - Arthur Ashe Court - Tennis US Open 202
programme.desc: World No. 1 and defending champion Aryna Sabalenka returns to Arthur Ashe Stadium aiming for her fourth Grand Slam crown and successive US Open titles. Across the net, Amanda Anisimova reaches her first New York final after stunning Iga Świątek and Naomi Osaka. The American leads their rivalry 6–3, adding intrigue to a high-stakes clash. Victory would place the winner among the defining stories of the 125th US Open.

programme.title: Casper Ruud (NOR) vs Denis Shapovalov (CAN) - Final - ATP 500 Dallas Open 2025
programme.desc: Unseeded Denis Shapovalov faces second seed Casper Ruud. Shapovalov reached the final by defeating top-seeded Taylor Fritz and defending champion Tommy Paul, securing his second and third Top 10 wins of the week. Ruud advanced after a challenging semifinal against Jaume Munar, winning in a third-set tiebreak. This final marks Shapovalov's pursuit of his third ATP title and first above the ATP 250 level, while Ruud aims for his 13th career title.

Um Salal vs Al Gharafa - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W12
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Nants vs Paris - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: "AHMED ELMOHAMADYThe Three Peat" - Afcon 2025
programme.desc: "Following Egypt’s 2006 AFCON win, he established himself as a regular in the national team. Ahmed Elmohamady recounts the side’s three tournament triumphs between 2006 and 2010 and explains how his displays during that period secured a transfer to the Premier League."

programme.desc: The 2025 Africa Cup of Nations, commonly known as AFCON 2025, marks the 35th edition of this prestigious biennial tournament organized by the Confederation of African Football (CAF). This edition will be hosted by Morocco for the second time, following its previous hosting in 1988. Stay updated with comprehensive coverage of the AFCON Morcco 2025 on beIN Sports News.

programme.title: Countdown Show - Trophée des Champions 2026
programme.desc: The 2026 Trophée des Champions, also known as the French Super Cup, between Paris Saint-Germain and Olympique de Marseille will take place in Kuwait City at the Jaber Al-Ahmad International Stadium. Ahead of the main studio, “Countdown” covers the arrival of the teams and fans in the build up to the "Le Classique".

programme.title: Countdown Show - Trophée des Champions 2026
programme.desc: The 2026 Trophée des Champions, also known as the French Super Cup, between Paris Saint-Germain and Olympique de Marseille will take place in Kuwait City at the Jaber Al-Ahmad International Stadium. programme.title: PSG vs Marseille - Trophée des Champions 2026
programme.desc: The 2026 Trophée des Champions, also known as the French Super Cup, between Paris Saint-Germain and Olympique de Marseille will take place in Kuwait City at the Jaber Al-Ahmad International Stadium. This "Le Classique" match features PSG, 2024-25 Ligue 1 & Coupe de France winners, against Marseille, Ligue 1 runners-up. Join the beIN team as they cover all the nights action from Kuwait.
